Key Match Events: Coby White narrowly missed his first career triple-double, finishing with 23 points, 10 rebounds and nine assists
Miles Bridges had 31 points, 12 rebounds and eight assists for the Hornets, whoâ€™ve lost 16 of 17
Bridges connected on a leaning 3-pointer with 2 seconds left to send the game into OT
Patrick Williams knocked down a corner 3 off an assist from Lonzo Ball with 49 seconds left in overtime to push the Chicago lead to seven
Pre-Game Insights: The Ball brothers matchup never materialized. LaMelo missed the game wrist soreness.
Brandon Miller (sprained ankle) also sat for the Hornets. Zach LaVine (toe soreness) and Ayo Dosunmu (soleus strain) were out for Chicago
Post-Match Reflections: The Bulls raced to an eight-point lead as White scored on a drive and Vucevic and Craig knocked down 3s
The extra period was all Chicago.
LaMelo Ball has now missed 116 of Charlotte's last 196 games over the past three seasons.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Guard Tre Mann will miss at least another two weeks with disc irritation
Leipzig substitute Christoph Baumgartner scored in the final minute before Bremen's Oliver Burke scored in stoppage time
Others: The Wizards host the Bulls on Wednesday night. The Hornets visit Detroit on Friday night.
